scene_description: The scene shows a two-lane roadway surrounded by trees and buildings, with a
"SLOW" marking and an arrow painted on the road surface, followed by "X-ING" and

a raised zebra crossing. Two pedestrians are walking on the left-side sidewalk,
moving away from the crossing area. Multiple parked and moving vehicles are
visible further down the road, but no vehicles or pedestrians are currently
occupying the crossing. The weather appears overcast, and there are no visible
traffic lights in the immediate view. Lane markings, including double yellow
lines on the left and dashed white lines on the right, clearly define the road
boundaries.
